column1: Our competitive advantages are reflected in superior unit economics and margins

column3: Based on: (a) £1M seed funding, (b) CAC of £10-£40, (c) 2-3% conversion rates, (d) viral coefficient 1.2x
No price increases assumed (conservative), actual pricing power could increase ARR 10-20%
Improving from 20% to 12% over 5 years through: better onboarding, feature expansion, customer success
Blended across all tiers, increasing slightly as we scale into more competitive markets
Serverless architecture keeps COGS low, scales linearly with users but decreasing per-user cost
Assumes aggressive hiring to support growth: 8 → 46 employees over 5 years
Assumes shift from organic (Year 1) to paid (Years 3-5) as we scale, budgeted at 5% of revenue
Seed (2026): £1M, Series A (2028): £5M @ £35M post, Series B (2030): £15M @ £150M post
Not modeled, music distribution relatively consistent year-round
All figures in GBP, no FX hedging assumed

Organic growth focus, referral program, content marketing
Affordable pricing, value proposition, essential service
